scan_metadata.description: timestream - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks database encryption settings
check_functions.description: Ensures Timestream database encryption is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks encryption in transit settings
check_functions.description: Ensures encryption in transit is enabled for Timestream

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks resource access control settings
check_functions.description: Validates access control for Timestream resources

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks fine-grained access control for tables
check_functions.description: Ensures fine-grained access control is enabled for tables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks fine-grained access control for rows
check_functions.description: Ensures fine-grained access control is enabled for rows

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors database patch status
check_functions.description: Checks if Timestream database is on the latest patch

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Reviews security configuration settings
Code Executable - Checks in-transit encryption settings
Code Executable - Checks fine-grained access control for tables
check_functions.description: Validates fine-grained access control for tables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks row-level security settings
check_functions.description: Validates row-level security for Timestream tables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors CloudWatch alarms for database
check_functions.description: Checks if CloudWatch alarms are enabled for database

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors CloudWatch alarms for tables
check_functions.description: Checks if CloudWatch alarms are enabled for tables
